I've got another task for you. It's important, but not critical. East of here there's a rock outcropping with a terrace about halfway up. Ramun mentioned some activity around our detector stone there. If you could check the area out, I'd appreciate it.

On a personal note, I understand there's not only a really amazing view of our camp from up there, but also a spectacular skyreach flower that blooms once a day under the arch.

Climb up the vines and take a look around. Please pick me one of those flowers, and use this teleport scroll to return.

(It looks like the detector stone Jorhon was speaking of, placed here to detect any intruders that may wander near Mathar Spire.)

(Now, climb the vine to the top of the spire.)

Scratches on the stone? Very interesting. Didn't think that was possible. I'll have another patrol added to the area.

And what's that you've got there?"A skyreach flower..."

Another flower? I don't mind the attention, but I've got more on my mind than sweet-smelling blossoms right now.

We depend on those markers to keep our camp safe—if someone—or some thing—is investigating them, we need to be on alert.
